member.name: T:ColorfulFishingRods.Framework.ModConfig
member.summary: The config class for this mod.

member.name: F:ColorfulFishingRods.Framework.ModConfig.Map
member.summary: A map of colors and overrides.

member.name: T:ColorfulFishingRods.I18n
member.summary: Get translations from the mod's i18n folder.
member.remarks: This is auto-generated from the i18n/default.json file when the project is compiled.

member.name: M:ColorfulFishingRods.I18n.GetByKey(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Get a translation by its key.
member.param: An object containing token key/value pairs. This can be an anonymous object (like new { value = 42, name = "Cranberries" }), a dictionary, or a class instance.
